channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Prime Fifty Supplements
channel.desc: The Prime Fifty range features nutritional supplements tailored specifically to the needs of the over 50s and beyond, helping you to have the time of your life in the prime of your life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Marla Wynne Fashion Collection
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe for the new year with gorgeous Wynne Layers fashion from MarlaWynne, featuring layering pieces, scarves and more to help give every outfit the perfect finishing touch.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: skinSense by Abi Cleeve
channel.desc: Bringing together the latest, ground-breaking technology with the highest grade concentration of unique active ingredients, discover long-lasting skincare with anti-ageing benefits from skinSense.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Afternoon Style with Katy
channel.desc: Discover the latest trends from the biggest fashion brands with a little help from QVC presenter, Katy.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Diamonique with Dale
channel.desc: Diamonique with Dale.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New Season Kipling
channel.desc: Showcasing all the new fashionable and classic bags created by this international brand, including handbags, rucksacks, travel bags and weekend away bags.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion
channel.desc: Tune in for style advice and inspiration from Ruth, plus find everything from a great pair of jeans and a stylish jacket, to chic pieces featuring pops of colour and vibrant print.

channel.title: Sort Your Home Out with Periea
channel.desc: Get ready for a new year clean with Periea! Discover must-have cleaning and storage solutions at QVC, perfect for tidying up your routine and transforming your space.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Independent Living
channel.desc: Join us as we showcase products that help people with reduced mobility enjoy an active lifestyle. From mobility scooters to sound amplifiers, our range can help people improve their quality of life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Clean & Tidy with Periea
channel.desc: It's time to tidy up and refresh your home with help from Periea. With a range of organisation solutions to choose from, your house will be looking spick and span in no time.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Style for the Season
channel.desc: Next season's style starts here. Showcasing the very latest in fashion, from fabulous dresses to gorgeous skirts, this show is your ticket to brilliant dressing in a flash.

channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.title: Nina Leonard
channel.desc: A collection of beautifully designed and elegant knitwear dresses, skirts and sweaters with co-ordinated accessories.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Supersize Your Beauty
channel.desc: Buy in bulk and enjoy great value for money with this fantastic selection of supersized beauty products from a range of different brands.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kelly Hoppen Home Design
channel.desc: Kelly Hoppen is a renowned interior designer and now she's created a range just for QVC! It includes fine linens, cushions and accent pieces featuring her signature style.

channel.desc: Tune in to Jewellery on Friday with Julia! Celebrate the dazzling world of Jewellery, featuring pieces from a variety of ranges, ready to uplift any jewellery collection with a dash of sparkle.
